text: Albán Vermes (19 June 1957 – 3 February 2021) was a Hungarian swimmer. He participated at the 1980 Summer Olympics, winning a silver medal in 200 metre breaststroke. He was born in Eger, Hungary. Vermes died on 3 February 2021, aged 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hungarian swimmers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Heves County
title: Albán Vermes
